contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox film | name = War in the Kitchen | image = | image_size = | caption = | director = [[Marius Barna]] | producer = | writer = | narrator = | starring = [[Gheorghe Dinică]]<br />Ovidiu Niculescu | music = | cinematography = | editing = | distributor = | released = [[2001 in film|2001]] | runtime = | country = [[Romania]] | language = [[Romanian language|Romanian]] | budget = | preceded_by = | followed_by = }} '''''War in the Kitchen''''' ({{lang-ro|Război în bucătărie}}) is a [[Romania]]n film drama by [[Marius Theodor Barna]]. The film was produced in 2001 by [[Ager Film]] in collaboration with [[Televiziunea Română]] (TVR). It stars [[Gheorghe Dinică]] as the main actor. ==External links== *{{imdb title|id=0284422|title=Razboi în bucatarie}} [[Category:2001 films]] [[Category:Romanian films]] [[Category:Romanian-language films]] [[Category:2000s drama films]] {{Romania-film-stub}} {{2000s-drama-film-stub}}
